reviews.content: Works really well no problems for months and is a nice touch to you status bar
So far it works just fine. No noticeable issues. Sometimes the battery colors change (slightly darker) when opening apps.

Working perfectly on iOS 13.5 
iPhone 11 Pro Max

iPhone 11Pro (13.5)
When you want to change the color, ColorMyBattery closes.
The tweaks section installed in settings disappears, you have to close settings and reopen it so that the newly installed tweaks are visible.
